{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Power crystal pillar | class = PillarAlienPower | game = Strife | doomednum = 227 | convid = 215 }}[[Classes]]: PillarAlienPower
A huge pillar containing a {{Class|PowerCrystal|power crystal}}, overgrown by odd alien fungus. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PillarAlienPower { {{Property|Radius}} 24 {{Property|Height}} 192 +{{Flag|SOLID}} {{Property|ActiveSound}} "ambient/alien2" States { Spawn: APOW A 4 [[A_LoopActiveSound]] Loop } }
